content: MADRID  Nov 18 Spain's Gas Natural said late on Friday it had agreed to sell the 59.1 percent stake it owns in its Colombian retail distribution unit to infrastructures fund Brookfield Infrastructure for 482 million euros ($568 million.
name: Brookfield Infrastructure Partners LP
title: Spain's Gas Natural sells Colombian distribution unit to Brookfield

content: LIMA  Sept 11 An appeals court in Peru has rescinded a ban on Brazilian construction company Odebrecht SA's sale of its Olmos irrigation business to a consortium led by Brookfield Infrastructure Partners LP  the office of Peru's judiciary said on Monday.
name: Brookfield Infrastructure Partners LP
title: Peru court allows Odebrecht's sale of Olmos to Brookfield
